title: 5th sem electives that no one is talking about??
content: I'm talking about text and speech processing, image processing, and real time operating system. I was scrolling through pesu reddit searching for advice on electives, and didn't find anything about these subjects. Are they newly added? Any opinions or advice on these? Coz they do seem really interesting.

comments.body: Text and speech processing sounds like a new elective (unless its the rebranded NLP elective), or image processing (unless again its the rebranded CV elective). Maybe search using these course names? Or share the syllabus and prof here and someone can help.
